name: Fighter
description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

class_features.name: Fighting Style
class_features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

class_features.name: Second Wind
class_features.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

class_features.name: Action Surge
class_features.description: You can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action.

name: Wizard
description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

class_features.name: Spellcasting
class_features.description: As a student of arcane magic, you have a spellbook containing spells that show the first glimmerings of your true power.

class_features.name: Arcane Recovery
class_features.description: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover.

class_features.name: Arcane Tradition
class_features.description: You choose an arcane tradition, shaping your practice of magic.

name: Cleric
description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

class_features.name: Spellcasting
class_features.description: As a conduit for divine power, you can cast cleric spells.

class_features.name: Divine Domain
class_features.description: Choose one domain related to your deity.

class_features.name: Channel Divinity
class_features.description: You gain the ability to channel divine energy directly from your deity, using that energy to fuel magical effects.

name: Rogue
description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

class_features.name: Expertise
class_features.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.

class_features.name: Sneak Attack
class_features.description: You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll.

class_features.name: Cunning Action
class_features.description: You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.
